title: University Science Education Program for Collaborative Competency Strengthening Based on MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Project-based learning program to strengthen collaborative competencies in science fields within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, applicable in educational settings similar to the Al Akhawayn University Fez School of Business case

learning_goals: Learners enhance scientific problem-solving skills by completing three or more online collaborative projects with peers via a MOOC platform over four weeks.
Learners develop efficient communication strategies with team members during science data collection and analysis using digital tools (smartphone apps, collaboration platforms).
Learners demonstrate collaborative competencies (achieving over 80% based on self/peer assessment criteria) in solving real-world science problems through project-based assessment.

resources: Whiteboard/Marker Set for Offline Group Activities
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
